TopicTitle: When you add a mission control building

Articles.Content:
I'm also curious when you putting out a realistic re-entry.

It would be cool.

Anyway, Kerbal it's cool;-)

The Developers and Moderators would be very grateful if people were to stop asking "When..... ?"

Nobody knows. The Developers don't even know which of the features planned for the next release will make it in time to be included.

Many thanks to all those who manage to restrain their enthusiasm and impatience!
